SA:
An 8-to-1 multiplexer has three select inputs (a=>s2, b=>s1, c=>s0). Assume you want the multiplexer output to be equivalent to the following expression:

Out = ab'c' + a'bc' + a'b'c

Thus, your digital circuit would look as follows: 

  +------------------------+ 
  |           Mux          |
X---> in0                  |
X---> in1                  |
X---> in2                  |
X---> in3                  |
X---> in4                  |
X---> in5                  |
X---> in6                  |
X---> in7                  |
  |                   Out ---> ab'c' + a'bc' + a'b'c
  |        sel[2:0]        |
  |         //_\          |
  +-----------|------------+
              |
abc-----------!

What values should be connected to the data inputs? Please enter the 8 bits without spaces.
